code: export var types={SET_POSSIBLE_MOVES:'SET_POSSIBLE_MOVES',CLEAR_POSSIBLE_MOVES:'CLEAR_POSSIBLE_MOVES',SET_TURN:'SET_TURN',SET_PLAYER:'SET_PLAYER',SET_OPPONENT:'SET_OPPONENT',SET_PLAYER_COLOUR:'SET_PLAYER_COLOUR',SET_MESSAGE:'SET_MESSAGE',CLEAR_MESSAGE:'CLEAR_MESSAGE',SET_OPPONENT_MOVES:'SET_OPPONENT_MOVES',CLEAR_OPPONENT_MOVES:'CLEAR_OPPONENT_MOVES',SET_OPPONENT_COLOUR:'SET_OPPONENT_COLOUR'};export var setPlayer=function setPlayer(name){return{type:types.SET_PLAYER,name:name};};export var setOpponent=function setOpponent(opponent){return{type:types.SET_OPPONENT,name:opponent===null||opponent===void 0?void 0:opponent.name};};export var setPlayerColour=function setPlayerColour(colour){return{type:types.SET_PLAYER_COLOUR,colour:colour};};export var setMessage=function setMessage(message){return{type:types.SET_MESSAGE,message:message};};export var setOpponentMoves=function setOpponentMoves(moves){return{type:types.SET_OPPONENT_MOVES,moves:moves};};export var clearOpponentMoves=function clearOpponentMoves(){return{type:types.CLEAR_OPPONENT_MOVES};};export var setOpponentColour=function setOpponentColour(colour){return{type:types.SET_OPPONENT_COLOUR,colour:colour};};
